${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: Draw !M! cards or gain !HeavensChild:M2! Strength.

${ModID}:OverheadSmash.NAME: Overhead Smash
${ModID}:OverheadSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, apply !M! Vulnerable.

${ModID}:PullThrough.NAME: Pull Through
${ModID}:PullThrough.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn discard !M! card.

${ModID}:HeavyLifting.NAME: Heavy Lifting
${ModID}:HeavyLifting.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! Strength for each Attack played this turn.

${ModID}:LostSoul.NAME: Lost Soul
${ModID}:LostSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:RefinedTechnique.NAME: Refined Technique
${ModID}:RefinedTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your Attacks.

${ModID}:Overstrain.NAME: Overstrain
${ModID}:Overstrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next Attack you play deals half damage.

${ModID}:CrazySwing.NAME: Crazy Swing
${ModID}:CrazySwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !HeavensChild:D2! damage, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
${ModID}:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you received attack damage last turn, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Arrangements.NAME: Arrangements
${ModID}:Arrangements.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 card. Next turn, play that card.
${ModID}:Arrangements.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard 1 cards. Next turn, play that card.

${ModID}:PressTheAttack.NAME: Press the Attack
${ModID}:PressTheAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. If you drew an Attack, deal !HeavensChild:D2! damage.

${ModID}:WideSlash.NAME: Wide Slash
${ModID}:WideSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card in your discard pile.

${ModID}:GracefulFlip.NAME: Graceful Flip
${ModID}:GracefulFlip.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Decrease the cards drawn by this card by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
${ModID}:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you discarded a card this turn, deal !HeavensChild:D2! damage instead.

${ModID}:ThreateningRoar.NAME: Threatening Roar
${ModID}:ThreateningRoar.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Attack drawn, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:IntimidatingShout.NAME: Intimidating Shout
${ModID}:IntimidatingShout.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Skill drawn, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Tumble.NAME: Tumble
${ModID}:Tumble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional cards and discard !HeavensChild:M2! card.

${ModID}:GracefulLanding.NAME: Graceful Landing
${ModID}:GracefulLanding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL heavenschild:Master: Receive no attack damage last turn.

${ModID}:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight Of Hand
${ModID}:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever this card is drawn, discard it. NL When you discard this card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:FullBodyTackle.NAME: Full-Body Tackle
${ModID}:FullBodyTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Next turn, discard !HeavensChild:M2! cards.

${ModID}:VenomBlade.NAME: Venom Blade
${ModID}:VenomBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to half of the damage dealt.

${ModID}:MasterPlan.NAME: Master Plan
${ModID}:MasterPlan.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you discard this card from your hand, choose a Skill in your discard pile and play it.
${ModID}:MasterPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If you discard this card from your hand, choose a Skill in your discard pile and play it.

${ModID}:SneakAttack.NAME: Sneak Attack
${ModID}:SneakAttack.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you discard this card from your hand, choose an Attack in your discard pile and play it.
${ModID}:SneakAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If you discard this card from your hand, choose an Attack in your discard pile and play it.

${ModID}:IgniteSpirit.NAME: Ignite Spirit
${ModID}:IgniteSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your discard pile. NL Gain Strength equal to its cost.
${ModID}:IgniteSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your discard pile. NL Gain Strength equal to its cost +1.

${ModID}:PerfectGuard.NAME: Perfect Guard
${ModID}:PerfectGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gains 1 additional Block for ALL your Skills.

${ModID}:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
${ModID}:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each *Skill drawn this way, gain !${ModID}:M2! Dexterity. NL Exhaust

${ModID}:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
${ModID}:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block at the start of your next X turns. NL heavenschild:Master: Have a Debuff.
